plugin.title: WordPress Plugin
plugin.description: To automatically sync content from your WordPress site, you'll need to install the Ghost Post Connect plugin.

instructions.title: Installation Instructions
instructions.step1: Download the plugin file (.zip) by clicking the button below
instructions.step2: Go to your WordPress Dashboard â†’ Plugins â†’ Add New â†’ Upload Plugin
instructions.step3: Select the downloaded ZIP file and click "Install Now"
instructions.step4: Activate the plugin and enter the API key shown in settings

contextMessages.dashboard: Your site performance is up 24% this month. Should I analyze what's driving this growth?

contextMessages.automations: I can create a new automation to fix broken links automatically. Want me to set it up?
contextMessages.linkBuilding: I found 12 new high-quality backlink opportunities. Should I draft outreach emails?

contextMessages.seoFrontend: 12 images are missing alt text. I can generate optimized descriptions now. Proceed?

contextMessages.keywordStrategy: Found 4 low-competition keywords with high potential. Should I create content briefs?
contextMessages.settings: Your automation settings look good. Need help configuring anything else?

questions.welcome: ðŸ‘‹ Hi! I'm your Ghost AI Agent. I'll help you create a comprehensive SEO profile for your website. Let's start with the basics!
questions.businessType: What type of business do you run?
questions.primaryProducts: What are your main products or services? Describe what you offer to your customers.
questions.targetAudience: Who is your target audience? Tell me about their demographics, interests, and behaviors.
questions.mainKeywords: What are the main keywords you want to rank for? List 5-10 primary keywords related to your business.
questions.competitors: Who are your main competitors? Please provide 3-5 competitor website URLs.
questions.targetRegions: What geographic regions are you targeting?
questions.seoGoals: What are your primary SEO goals?
questions.currentTraffic: What's your current monthly organic traffic? (Approximate number is fine)
questions.contentTypes: What types of content do you currently publish?
questions.publishingFrequency: How often do you publish new content?
questions.toneVoice: What's your brand's tone and voice? (e.g., Professional, casual, friendly, authoritative, etc.)
questions.cmsplatform: What CMS platform do you use? (e.g., WordPress, Shopify, Wix, Custom, etc.)
questions.hostingProvider: Who is your hosting provider? (e.g., AWS, GoDaddy, Bluehost, etc.)
questions.hasExistingContent: Do you have existing content on your website?
questions.brandVoice: Let's define your brand voice. Based on your business, I'll suggest a tone and style for your content.
questions.reviewSummary: Here's a summary of your responses. Please review and make any changes if needed.
questions.complete: ðŸŽ‰ Excellent! I've collected all the information I need. Your personalized SEO strategy is ready!
